result.title: Are some Testcases added during system testing of 3rd question of Codeforces Round #263 (Div. 2)
result.content: During the contest i have challenged these two solution 7593695 , 7593010 my test case was 2 1 2 when i challenged their solution it was showing "Invalid Input". but these solution gave wrong answer on the very same cases after system testing What does this mean "Invalid Input"..???
